title: Ep 540 | Missy Can't Believe the Baby Formula Shortage, Robertson Food Fights, & Pro-Life DNA
description:
Missy and Phil discuss the "strange" baby formula shortage, the lack of baby formula companies in the United States, and the lack of concern from the government. Jase recalls the early years when he and his brothers had to fight dirty to get their fair share of supper, and Al recalls his dinnertime recipes when he would cook for his younger brothers. And Missy talks about the desire to nurture being in the very DNA of women, placed there by God for the support of future generations.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Visit https://CovEyes.com/PHIL and get 30 days free with the code: PHIL 
-
